system.effect: Protects the vessel while in the immaterium. Hexagramic wards provide +10 to any Navigation Tests to pilot the ship while in the warp. When rolling warp encounters, roll twice, Navigator chooses result.

description.value: Protects the vessel while in the immaterium. Hexagramic wards provide +10 to any Navigation Tests to pilot the ship while in the warp. When rolling warp encounters, roll twice, Navigator chooses result.
